comment:
>>40004817
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Hey, Ayla, you're a Technician, right?
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Yes, why? ))
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( You know I'm sitting right next to you, right?
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( I swear to God, I can see the look on your face. If this is the lead-in to some shitty joke, I'm so not down. ))
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Oh, damnit. You got me. How'd you know?
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Because, despite your getting the better of me earlier, you're really not that hard to read. ))
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( You must be seriously bored. Of all the people I've met in Averron, I think your attention span is the shortest. ))
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Is it getting to you again? ))
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Actually, I was going to ask about that thing you were doing way earlier.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: What's it called, again? ERP?
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( I. ))
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( ...Who told you? ))
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Ahahaha, nobody. I was just guessing.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Are you blushing?
> [[ Ayla ]]: ...Ashe.
> [[ Ayla ]]: This is. a really good way to get blown up.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: I'm kidding, I'm kidding! I won't tell.

> Have a look around the labs while Nel is exploring.
> See who's online, or message someone else. (Write-in)
> Check the dusty memento, and see if anything's changed.
> Log out.
> Write-in.
name: BSO
